name: Clash of clans but it's an open world RPG
name_original: Clash of clans but it's an open world RPG
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Basically what you will want to do in this game is just explore the world and go whichever way you want to and fight bad guys and destroy bases for EXP, then once you gain enough EXP, you can level up and play as new characters. and unlock new areas.

 CONTROLS: 

Use WASD to move around.

Use your mouse to aim your weapon.

Simply click to attack.

Press Q to change your character.

Press E to customize your character.
